settings.heading: Play Tennis Leagues
settings.description: The fun and excitement of tennis with the thrill of having an entire team supporting you on every point. UTR Sports Team Tennis Leagues is an innovative format for players and providers to maximize fun! Enjoy level-based play in a team format across multiple seasons throughout the year. Grow and develop your game with matches counting towards Verified UTR Ratings!

settings.heading: CAPTAIN A TEAM
settings.list: Captaining a team has never been easier with our new player availability and lineup management features.
settings.list2: Earn free league entry and special captain UTR Sports/Fabletics swag!
settings.list3: Four seasons a year: winter, spring, summer, fall. Seasons consist of 6 team matches: 3 home, 3 away. Divisions based on UTR Rating and gender.
settings.list4: Recruit players for your team, secure court time for home matches, and lead your team to victory!

settings.heading: Play Junior team tennis
settings.description: Junior Team Tennis is for all players under the age of 18 looking to play level-based matches in a team format. All season matches count towards your Verified UTR Rating! Make your way to Regional and State Playoffs.

settings.heading: play adult tennis leagues
settings.description: Adult Tennis Leagues bring level-based matches to a club near you! Players can easily register on a team through the website and view the team's schedule and results. Each match counts towards Verified UTR Ratings. Level-based matches, flexible formats, and fun guaranteed!
UTR Sports Tennis Adult Leagues have a modern and progressive format with true level-based play.
settings.author: Dana Gill

settings.description: UTR Rating narrows down the divisions and the competition is better.
settings.author: Mary Cornell

settings.description: The team component makes playing fun, and the time commitment is much more family-friendly.
